explanation:
code_hardening: none; explicitly did not add null checks or resource-closing logic to match the intent, leaving the RandomAccessFile unclosed.
resolve_compilation_errors: added construction of a java.io.File from the provided String path and introduced a static method signature readLastLine(String) compatible with the Util class context.
exception_handling: replaced fully qualified exception names with unqualified FileNotFoundException and IOException, preserved the tryâ€“catch structure, removed the finally block, and kept return-null-on-error behavior.
logic_customization: replaced RandomAccessFile.length() usage with File.length() to compute fileLength, preserved the reverse-scan algorithm and newline (0xA, 0xD) semantics, and refactored newline conditionals with explicit else branches without changing behavior.
refactoring: renamed the method from tail to readLastLine, changed it from an instance method to a static one, updated the parameter from File to String, and adjusted internal variable naming accordingly.
misc: none
